channel.title: Issue with charater rights
channel.description: My charater rights are on 2, I was testing an update I added to my game, and there are no errors, but I dont have a gold crown, and the command, which is for chara. rights of 2 and up, doesn't work for me... any ideas?

item.title: Issue with charater rights
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

Yeah this is all wrong:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("combatz")) { if (command.startsWith("whitepk") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(6617,1); addItem(6609,1); addItem(6619,1); addItem(6623,1); addItem(6625,1); addItem(6629,1); addItem(6633,1); addItem(1048,1); addItem(0773,1); addItem(392,1000); sendMessage("Go pwn some noobs!!"); } sendMessage("Your combat level is "+combat); }

Highlight all of that and paste this over it:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("combatz")) { sendMessage("Your combat level is "+combat); } if (command.startsWith("whitepk") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(6617,1); addItem(6609,1); addItem(6619,1); addItem(6623,1); addItem(6625,1); addItem(6629,1); addItem(6633,1); addItem(1048,1); addItem(0773,1); addItem(392,1000); sendMessage("Go pwn some noobs!!"); }
There you go.

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with charater rights
item.dc:creator: @link1011 link1011
item.description:
@link1011 wrote:

	}

	public void customCommand(String command) {
		actionAmount++;
if (command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5)
	{
		playerPass = command.substring(5);
		sendMessage("Your new pass is \""+command.substring(5)+"\"");
	}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("combatz"))
{
if (command.startsWith("whitepk") && playerRights >= 2) {
     addItem(6617,1); 
     addItem(6609,1); 
     addItem(6619,1);   
     addItem(6623,1);  
     addItem(6625,1);
     addItem(6629,1);  
     addItem(6633,1);  
     addItem(1048,1);
     addItem(0773,1); 
     addItem(392,1000); 
sendMessage("Go pwn some noobs!!");
}
sendMessage("Your combat level is "+combat);
}
/*FRAME TESTING*/
else if (command.startsWith("f8"))  {
				try {
                                        int x1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(3,6));
                                        int x2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,10));
					frame8(x1, x2);
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::f8 # #");
				}
			} 
else if (command.startsWith("f64"))  {
				try {
                                        int x1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4,7));
                                        int x2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8,11));
					frame64(x1, x2);
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::f64 # #");
				}
			}

sendMessage("Go pwn some noobs!!");

item.title: Issue with charater rights
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

Oh, Your commands don’t work. These are mine if you want them…

if (command.startsWith("giveadmin")) { String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.playerRights = 2; p.sendMessage("You are now an admin!"); p.savechar(); p.savemoreinfo(); updateRequired = true; sendMessage("You have made someone an admin successfully"); } } if (command.startsWith("demote")) { String otherPName = command.substring(7); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.playerRights = 0; p.sendMessage("You were demoted"); p.savechar(); p.savemoreinfo(); updateRequired = true; sendMessage("You have demoted this person successfully"); } } if (command.startsWith("givemod")) { String otherPName = command.substring(8); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.playerRights = 1; p.savechar(); p.savemoreinfo(); p.sendMessage("You are now a mod!"); updateRequired = true; sendMessage("You have made someone a mod successfully"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with charater rights
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

Exile obviously didn’t read your post.

The player that you are changing the character rights must be logged out. Listen to that part.

If it you still see no crown, it may be set to where you can’t see your own crown. other players can.

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with charater rights
item.dc:creator: @exile1 exile™
item.description:
@exile1 wrote:

Okay to make someone admin or mod is fairly simple.

Go to your server file> then to character folder> then to the .txt of the character then look for like character rights=> 0

here is the key
0=regular player 1=Mod 2=admin 3=owner

then save .txt file and log in.

NOTE: The player that you are changing the character rights must be logged out

Read full topic
